info.description: This is an ecommerce service API
info.title: Ecommerce API

put.description: Change the password of the currently logged-in user

get.description: Get details of the currently logged-in user

post.description: Sign up with username, email, and password

get.description: Get a list of all brands
Get a brand by its ID

delete.description: Delete a brand from the system

get.description: Get a list of all cart items (Admin only)

post.description: Add a product to the user's shopping cart

get.description: Get paginated list of all cart items (Admin only)
Get a specific cart item by its ID

put.description: Update quantity of a cart item

post.description: Create a new order for a user

get.description: Get all orders placed by a specific user
Get details of a specific order by its ID

put.description: Update the status of an order (admin only), or quantity (user)

get.description: Get a list of all products

post.description: Create a new product with brand association (admin only)

get.description: Get all products associated with a specific brand ID
Get a product by its ID

put.description: Update a product by its ID

delete.description: Delete a product from the system

get.description: Get all cart items for the authenticated user
